title: Save over $1400 on endless education with StackSkills Unlimited
content:
Macworld

Lifelong learning keeps the mind sharp and your skills up to date. A StackSkills Unlimited lifetime access pass opens the door to anything you want to learn, and you can save even more now through October 15th in this deal you won’t find on Prime.

Rated 4.6 out of five stars on Trustpilot, StackSkills Unlimited recruits trainers who actually work in the field to design its courses with a focus on a beginner-to-expert arc that makes it easy for anyone at any skill level to get started.

You can learn programming, image editing, project management, and more for work, then explore the world with courses on music, art, and other personally enriching topics. Progress is easy to track with completion certificates available, and over 50 courses are added every month, supported by quarterly Q&As by top trainers. Don’t miss this limited-time deal on this fantastic learning subscription. 

Get started with lifelong learning with StackSkills Unlimited lifetime access for $32.97 — reduced from the previous sales price of $70 — now through the end of October 15th.

Prices subject to change.
